content: introducing the encircle me coaster the matching coaster to the ** encircle me potholder 1 ** this pattern uses the front-post double and triple crochet stitch to create a modern citrus design it s bright fun and perfect for summer these coasters make great summer projects because they use lightweight cotton yarn they work up quickly and use less than 60 yds of yarn and they re small and portable so you can take them outside and make them without breaking a sweat i hope you enjoy making and using your coasters > you can find the free written pattern ** here 2 ** > the ** ad-free printable pdf ebook 3 ** includes 2 patterns in 1 the encircle me coaster and potholder materials * approximately 55 yds / 50 m of any worsted weight cotton yarn * 4 0mm crochet hook * scissors * yarn needle other info * 6 5 in diameter * great way to use up scrap yarn * pattern has been tech edited * the ad-free printable pdf includes step-by-step pictures links to video tutorials and instructions to make both the encircle me coaster and potholder 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/encircle-me-potholder 2 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-a-round-modern-citrus-coaster/ 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/encircle-me-coaster--potholder-ebook
